The Affinity Online Trading Lab is designed to bridge the gap between what you learned in the Affinity Trader Foundation Course and live trading. By sitting side-by-side with an experienced trader, you will have the ability  to observe firsthand how to implement and react to actual trades as they occur. toc:
Day One

  • Trading program rules and and guidelines
  • Group Introductions
  • Trading lab agenda
  • Trading platform set-up
  • Creating a trading layout
  • Route orders
  • Order types
  • Using level II
  • Daily chart review and create watch list for the next day
  • Online trading lab quiz
  • Homework : create your own trading plan

Day Two

  • Review program rules and and guidelines
  • Pre markets strategies "The Morning Rush"
  • Morning news and gauging reaction to announcements
  • Five minute high and five minute low directional day indicator
  • Watch for TPTST market moves
  • Market reversal and and continuation times
  • Hot key set-up and practice
  • Daily chart review and create watch list for the next day
  • Online trading lab quiz
  • Homework : create your own trading universe

Day Three

  • Scan the premarket for gaps
  • Trade the morning gap fade, gap fill, or gap and go
  • Look for 10:00-10:15 trend continuation plays
  • Practice TPTST until the 11:15 reversal
  • Managing a trade to risk less
  • Practice adds and takes
  • Daily chart review and create watch list for the next day
  • Online trading lab quiz
  • Homework: Create your personal trading journal

Day Four

  • Trading the morning rush if possible or scan the premarket for gaps
  • Trade the morning gap fade, gap fill, or gap and go
  • Look for 10:00-10:15 trend continuation plays
  • Individual trading plan meetings
  • Receive our integrated trading plan, trading journal and trading universe
  • Learn about end of day order imbalances
  • Trade the end of day volatility imbalance play
  • Daily chart review and create watch list for the next day
  • Online trading lab quiz

Day Five

  • Watch the reaction of the markets to the Friday news announcements
  • Individual trading time
  • Individual trading performance presentations
  • Final review program rules and and guidelines
  • Graduation
description: Understanding theory in a classroom is one thing but the application of that theory in a live market is quite another. The Affinity Online Trading Lab is designed to bridge the gap between what you learned in the Affinity Trader Foundation Course and live trading. By sitting side-by-side with an experienced trader, you will have the ability  to observe firsthand how to implement and react to actual trades as they occur. From properly setting up your trading screens to learning how to best route your trades, this hands on intensive 5-day online course will help you gain the confidence it takes to know when its time to enter and exit your trades. Unlike most trading education courses, this one provides you with the ability to practice what you are learning. You will have the opportunity to look into the mind of an Affinity Professional Intraday Trader and see how he prepares for each trading day; and as he places his trades, you will be doing the same while having the ability to take notes and ask questions on the spot during this live interactive course. There is no better way to learn how to successfully scalp, day, gap and swing trade than to watch and emulate that of a Professional Trader who earns a living from the markets. With The Affinity Online Trading Lab, you have that opportunity.
name: The Affinity Online Trading Lab

A Premier Online Trading Education Company!

Affinity Trading Institute™ is a proprietary trading leader in online day trading education, courses, seminars, strategies and services...

Trading Rooms > 5-Day Trading Lab

See The Comparison Chart of Trading Rooms

The Affinity Online Trading Lab
Fine tune your trading skills in a hands on live market training atmosphere

Covers: Scalp Trading, Intraday Trading, Gap Trading and Swing Trading

5-Day Intensive Trading Lab - $3,995

$3,995.00 Add to cart

Lab Description

Understanding theory in a classroom is one thing but the application of that theory in a live market is quite another. The Affinity Online Trading Lab is designed to bridge the gap between what you learned in the Affinity Trader Foundation Course and live trading. By sitting side-by-side with an experienced trader, you will have the ability to observe firsthand how to implement and react to actual trades as they occur. From properly setting up your trading screens to learning how to best route your trades, this hands on intensive 5-day online course will help you gain the confidence it takes to know when it’s time to enter and exit your trades.

Unlike most trading education courses, this one provides you with the ability to practice what you are learning. You will have the opportunity to look into the mind of an Affinity Professional Intraday Trader and see how he prepares for each trading day; and as he places his trades, you will be doing the same while having the ability to take notes and ask questions on the spot during this “live” interactive course.

There is no better way to learn how to successfully scalp, day, gap and swing trade than to watch and emulate that of a Professional Trader who earns a living from the markets. With The Affinity Online Trading Lab, you have that opportunity.

  • Daily chart review and create watch list for the next day

Day Three

  • Trade the morning gap fade, gap fill, or gap and go
  • Look for 10:00-10:15 trend continuation plays
  • Practice TPTST until the 11:15 reversal
  • Managing a trade to risk less
  • Practice adds and takes
  • Daily chart review and create watch list for the next day
  • Online trading lab quiz
  • Homework: Create your personal trading journal

Day Four

  • Trading the morning rush if possible or scan the premarket for gaps
  • Trade the morning gap fade, gap fill, or gap and go
  • Look for 10:00-10:15 trend continuation plays
  • Individual trading plan meetings
  • Receive our integrated trading plan, trading journal and trading universe
  • Learn about end of day order imbalances
  • Trade the end of day volatility imbalance play
  • Daily chart review and create watch list for the next day
  • Online trading lab quiz

Day Five

  • Watch the reaction of the markets to the Friday news announcements
  • Individual trading time
  • Individual trading performance presentations
  • Final review program rules and and guidelines
  • Graduation

What Our Traders are Saying

I have found Affinity Trading a vital resource in my trading and on going trading education. The online classroom approach is very useful, allowing interactions with the moderators when something isn't clear or needs elaborating. The 5 day course was very helpful, demystifying a lot of things and providing some foundational skills that I have really been using everyday in my trading.

—Josh Perkins

I have been using the online trading room since November and am so pleased with the results that I want to tell you of the outstanding job by Rob Shapiro. Before joining the room I had spent over three years on training and advisory services, only to get losing results. Since joining the room I have had 2 losing months and 9 winning months and am well ahead for the year.


Not only are Rob's recommendations very good, but his constant real time teaching are bringing my skill to a level I could not have achieved by myself. I know I have a lot to learn and am confident I am finally in the right place to maximize my potential as a trader.

—Robert D.

description: The Affinity Trader Advanced Theory and Practice Course takes the information you learned from the Affinity Trader Foundation Course to a higher level of understanding equipping you with the ultimate tool kit of technical strategies necessary to skillfully navigate and conquer the markets. This course will add to your existing knowledge an arsenal of advanced level trading education concepts. It will teach you how to recognize patterns and signals that lead to high probability day trading set-ups including when and where to exit using predetermined profit targets and protective stop losses. By creating and following your personal trading plan, you will diminish uncertainty by knowing before you enter a trade why you are risking your (or our) hard earned capital. Risk management and trade discipline is thoroughly covered so that you will be mentally prepared to place your trade when conditions are good and when to sit on the sidelines when they are not. Furthermore, we uncover the deeper psychological makeup of patterns and why they work. We also go into detail on how to develop a strong psychological mindset so that you can maintain confidence and tackle the psychological demons that hold back many traders from attaining profitability. Having a trading plan and knowing what to trade is important, but knowing how to handle those trades when they reach your profit goals or dont go your way is even more crucial.
name: The Affinity Trader Advanced Theory and Practice Course

The Affinity Trader Advanced Theory and Practice Course
Enhance your trading skills to level the playing field

2-Day Course - $2,995

$2,995.00 Add to cart

Prior to attending your scheduled course, you will be required to attend several online course modules that will better prepare you to understand and absorb what the live course teaches.

Prerequisite: The Affinity Trader Foundation Course

Course Description

The Affinity Trader Advanced Theory and Practice Course takes the information you learned from the Affinity Trader Foundation Course to a higher level of understanding equipping you with the ultimate tool kit of technical strategies necessary to skillfully navigate and conquer the markets.

This course will add to your existing knowledge an arsenal of advanced level trading education concepts. It will teach you how to recognize patterns and signals that lead to high probability day trading set-ups including when and where to exit using predetermined profit targets and protective stop losses. By creating and following your personal trading plan, you will diminish uncertainty by knowing before you enter a trade why you are risking your (or our) hard earned capital. Risk management and trade discipline is thoroughly covered so that you will be mentally prepared to place your trade when conditions are good and when to sit on the sidelines when they are not.

Furthermore, we uncover the deeper psychological makeup of patterns and why they work. We also go into detail on how to develop a strong psychological mindset so that you can maintain confidence and tackle the psychological demons that hold back many traders from attaining profitability. Having a trading plan and knowing what to trade is important, but knowing how to handle those trades when they reach your profit goals or don’t go your way is even more crucial.

description: All new traders need to be told the truth about trading and investing from the beginning. The Affinity Trading InstituteTM is committed to providing you trading courses and trading education without the hype that is so often abundant at trading seminars. Many people begin their trading career with little to no education expecting to become financially independent but what they soon realize is that trading is a challenging venture that first requires the proper knowledge, a proven trading plan and a professional coach to help gain experience and confidence. With an Affinity trading education, you will gain the knowledge and experience that will help you be better equipped to understand the markets and conquer its challenges. The Affinity Trading InstituteTM approach to trading is a technical one which relies on specific chart patterns to identify the major shifts in market sentiment. Whether you want to Scalp, Day, Swing or Long-term Trade, this course will empower you with the necessary knowledge to trade the markets using proven technical analysis strategies, disciplined risk management and a strong psychological mind set. Financial market data is presented in a number of ways; this trading course will show you how to analyze that data to your benefit rather than attempt to predict market events and occurrences. This helps you keep your opinions directly aligned with the market instead of letting your emotions decide what you want the market to do.
name: The Affinity Trader Foundation Course

Course Description

All new traders need to be told the truth about trading and investing from the beginning. The Affinity Trading Institute™ is committed to providing you trading courses and trading education without the hype that is so often abundant at trading seminars. Many people begin their trading career with little to no education expecting to become financially independent but what they soon realize is that trading is a challenging venture that first requires the proper knowledge, a proven trading plan and a professional coach to help gain experience and confidence. With an Affinity trading education, you will gain the knowledge and experience that will help you be better equipped to understand the markets and conquer its challenges.

The Affinity Trading Institute™ approach to trading is a technical one which relies on specific chart patterns to identify the major shifts in market sentiment. Whether you want to Scalp, Day, Swing or Long-term Trade, this course will empower you with the necessary knowledge to trade the markets using proven technical analysis strategies, disciplined risk management and a strong psychological mind set.

Financial market data is presented in a number of ways; this trading course will show you how to analyze that data to your benefit rather than attempt to predict market events and occurrences. This helps you keep your opinions directly aligned with the market instead of letting your emotions decide what you want the market to do.
